Hello, my name is

Abu Bakkar Anir.

I build things for the web.

I’m a software engineer specializing in frontend technologies (and occasionally doing the apis) for exceptional digital experiences. I’m focused on building products that are widely accessible, human-centered.

Connect On LinkedIn

About me ______________________

Hello! My name is Abu Bakar Anir and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My interest in web development started back in 2020 when I decided to build this with small web apllications like games , websites with javascript, html, css

Fast-forward to today, and I’ve had the privilege of working at a designing firm as software developer, a start-up, a remote based software agency. My main focus these days is building accessible, inclusive products and digital experiences for a variety of clients.

And also, I have been developing products for local business owner for time to time. And it happens that those opportunities trigger my compassion for building things that serves solutions for real problems.

Learning and trying new technologies never bores me. Here are a few technologies I’ve been working with recently:

  2. Javascript
  3. Typescript

  2. Nextjs

  4. Astro

(Featured)

Otterdev.io is the offical webstie for otterdev. This is a elegant website to attracts clients, who wanna build products that aligns with otterdev expertise. This website is animated with scroll triggering options.

Offgears is a ecommerce platform that does bike parts imports, exports businesses. This is a elegant website to attracts buyers of bike parts.

(Featured)

Ezytor

(Featured)

Ezytor is a website editor, that has lots of prebuild html, css templates. A user can chosse his/her own theme/templates and edit it and build an website from it with less time.
